metadata.title: SUSE-SU-2014:1605-1 -- Security update for OpenVPN (important)
metadata.description:
This update fixes a critical denial of service vulnerability in OpenVPN:
* CVE-2014-8104: Critical denial of service vulnerability in OpenVPN servers that can be triggered by authenticated attackers.
Also an incompatibility with OpenVPN and OpenSSL in FIPS mode has been fixed. (bnc#895882)
Security Issues:
* CVE-2014-8104 <http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2014-8104>
